page.title: 10Leisure And Recreation
page.content: I like Jacks. Jacks is a game where you have five jacks and a ball. You put the jacks on the back of your hand and throw them to land on your palm. If any fall on the floor you have to pick them up one at a time. When you do it the next time you have to pick them up in two's. You go on until you get up four and then you go on to double bounce. When you have done four double bounces you go on to three bounces and then four. Another thing I like doing is playing with my Aunt's kittens. When I wave my hand on the floor the kittens jump on my hand and climb on my lap. If you roll a ball it chases after it. My best game is playing Dogs with my brother Ricky. Ricky is the dog and he has races all by himself and when I say he has won he cuddles me and gives me a kiss.
